documents.document:
"Viserys sold my mother's crown, & men called him a beggar. I shall keep this one, so men will call me queen."
-Dany http://t.co/PgaikQuunx

I have a hole where my heart should be, she thought, and nowhere else to go.
-Arya Stark #asoiaf #ValarMorghulis http://t.co/VCkovVym0b

"Egg?” he said, as the rain streamed down his cheeks. “Egg, I dreamed that I was old."
-Aemon Targaryen #asoiaf http://t.co/bsSDeisgHY

"Elia of Dorne.You raped her. You murdered her. You killed her children. Now say her name!"
-Oberyn #BooksVsShow http://t.co/0KvQHUBhEs

"A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies. The man who never reads lives only one."
-Jojen Reed #asoiaf http://t.co/paAT5gV0CQ

"He has gone to bring us our heart's desire."
"What is our heart’s desire?”
“Vengeance. Justice. Fire & blood."
-Doran & Arianne #asoiaf

"Get the keys & remove those chains from him, before you make me rue the day I raped your mother."
-Roose Bolton http://t.co/7PpsY9eqNQ

"I am the only child the gods let him keep. The freakish one, not fit to be a son or daughter.”
-Brienne #asoiaf http://t.co/x5ZBApzv1A
"You have 5 trueborn children. The direwolf is the sigil of your House. Your children were meant to have these pups." http://t.co/2hR6v6NIbG

"That’s what I’ll give you,your brother’s head.”
"Maybe my brother will give me your head.”
Joffrey & Sansa #asoiaf http://t.co/MZdRplGzP9

"Confess, & have the same swift end the Young Wolf gave Lord Rickard. Lie, & you will burn. Choose."
-Stannis #TWOW http://t.co/MLcs6NUWaM
Anyone still #TeamStark?

"The city is built upon the land they gave us. In return we swore that we should always be their men. Stark men!"
-Wylla Manderly #asoiaf

"Even if the boy does live, he will be a cripple. Worse than a cripple, a grotesque. Give me a good clean death."
-Jaime #asoiaf #karma

He prayed Myrcella would find more joy in her Dornish boy than her mother found with her storm lord.
-Arys Oakheart http://t.co/bk7YqJ2GWv

"Someone talked. Someone always talks."
-Areo Hotah #asoiaf #GoTSeason5 #casting http://t.co/JWj7fKGJqd

"He has gone to bring us out heart's desire. Vengeance. Justice. Fire & Blood."
-Doran Martell #GoTSeason5 #casting http://t.co/74vEzPDyP9

"My sisters and I shall not wait ten-and-seven years for our vengeance."
-Nymeria Sand #asoiaf #GoTSeason5 #casting http://t.co/rB2pevjvlk

"Give me back my spear, Uncle. Cersei sent us a head. We should send her back a bag of them."
-Obara Sand #Season5 http://t.co/t2slIj5LZU

"Maybe I never saw a camel, but I know a camel's cunt when I smell one."
-Arya Stark #asoiaf #ValarMorghulis http://t.co/8LxiBX8Pwn
Daenerys Targaryen rose, & for the first time in hundreds of years, the night came alive with the music of dragons. http://t.co/EPAIIrHit1

“I can show you. In our joining there is power. Power to make life. Power to cast shadows.”
-Melisandre #asoiaf http://t.co/2AzshZQNlF

"Har! Would that I could find her again. She was fine to lay with, that bear."
-Tormund Giantsbane #asoiaf http://t.co/0l3XGDZuNJ

"We are only human, and the gods have fashioned us for love. That is our great glory, and our great tragedy."
-Aemon Targaryen #asoiaf

My own wedding is looking much better in hindsight.
-Tyrion Lannister #asoiaf http://t.co/nhxhhLRsTd

"When I'm King in my own right, I'm going to outlaw beets."
-Tommen Baratheon #asoiaf http://t.co/7866oiaJli

"They say night’s beauties fade at dawn, and the children of wine are oft disowned in the morning light."
-Barristan Selmy #asoiaf

"She is a widow of a Dothraki Khal. A mother of dragons & sacker of cities. Aegon the Conquerer with teats."
-Tyrion http://t.co/uU8bO9fVMo

“And now it begins,” said Ser Arthur Dayne, the Sword of the Morning.
“No,” Ned said with sadness. “Now it ends.” http://t.co/Go4vIrPKN0

I see only her. A dragon might be in the window, & I would never have seen anything but her smile.
-Arys Oakheart http://t.co/gUFviyUM3w

"There were trials. Of a sort. Lord Rickard demanded trial by combat, & the king granted the request."
Jaime #asoiaf http://t.co/eU0MRUtc8X

Val kissed him lightly on the cheek. "You have my thanks Lord Snow. For hope." Their breath mingled in the air.
-Val http://t.co/siHKwHJunP

“Let him be king over charred bones and cooked meat. Let him be the king of ashes.”
-Aerys Targaryen #asoiaf http://t.co/D0i1mHnqzo

"If she’s not wet by the time I’m done disrobing, I will cut off that tongue of yours & nail it to the wall."
-Ramsay Bolton #asoiaf

Remember who you are,what you were made to be. Remember your words.
"Fire & Blood," Daenerys told the swaying grass. http://t.co/9XePxWTjEf

"I rose too high, loved too hard, dared too much. I tried to grasp a star, overreached, and fell."
-Jon Connington http://t.co/ZZLV94jba0

"You claimed your rights, my lord, but in the darkness I would eat your heirs."
-Cersei #asoiaf #cerseiswallows http://t.co/rIfJjyWNfV
#WinterIsComingMotherfuckers #HouseStark

"The wolves will come again,"said Jojen solemnly.
"And how would you be knowing, boy?"
"I dreamed it."
Jojen Reed http://t.co/Jxwbg47eWx

"The prince will remember that, little lord."
"I pray he does. If he forgets, be a good dog & remind him."
#asoiaf http://t.co/YxRLQDJHdh

Needle was Robb & Bran & Rickon, her mother & her father, even Sansa. Needle was Jon Snow's smile.
-Arya #asoiaf http://t.co/9hRntIT0hP
RT @apoiaf: Some fans have figured out how ASoIaF ends & GRRM isn't changing it.... http://t.co/ASWXRtjxRl

"Only cowards dress in iron."
"This coward it about to kill you, ser."
-Khrazz & Barristan Selmy #asoiaf http://t.co/H4g8smzMZ9

"Rough fellows, by the look o’ them, & desperate too,but ne’er so desperate as to trifle with Ser Creighton Longbough."
Creighton Longbough

A blue flower growing from a chink in a Wall of ice, filling the air with sweetness.
-The Undying #asoiaf #R+L=J http://t.co/WTF8KxDdD6

"What is dead may never die, but rises again, harder and stronger."
-Aeron Greyjoy #asoiaf #ironborn http://t.co/GL6gjVG5hA

"Until the Moutain crushed my brother's skull no Dornishmen had died in this War of the 5 Kings. Tell me, is that my shame or glory?"
Doran

"Rhaegar fought valiantly, Rhaegar fought nobly, Rhaegar fought honorably. And Rhaegar died."
Jorah Mormont #asoiaf http://t.co/r4dxoUMI9N

"By the word of Eddard of the House Stark, Lord of Winterfell & Warden of the North, I do sentence you to die."
-Ned http://t.co/ah7qk570dO

So the girl is as clever as she is pretty. Tommen could do a deal worse for a queen.
-Jaime Lannister #asoiaf #wcw http://t.co/D5NMP8ZRK9

"I am not without mercy,” thundered he who was notoriously without mercy.
-Stannis Baratheon #asoiaf http://t.co/KJT2Q07Tom

"I saw the heads above your gates. Tell me true, which one gave you the fiercest fight, the cripple or the babe?"
-Asha Greyjoy #asoiaf

You smile like Gerion & fight like Tyg & there's some of Kevan in you.. but Tyrion is Tywin's son, not you.
-Genna http://t.co/ITyDFskAOa

Give me sweet lies, and keep your bitter truths.
-Tyrion Lannister #asoiaf http://t.co/ias35Dw9C0

"Ser Gregor, Dunsen, Polliver, Raff the Sweetling. The Tickler & the Hound. Ser Ilyn, Ser Meryn, King Joffrey, Queen Cersei."
-Arya #asoiaf

"Are you the Sword of the Morning now?"
"No. Men call me Darkstar, & I am of the night."
-Myrcella & Gerold Dayne http://t.co/rI9BT4GClH

"I am the dragon's daughter, & I swear to you, these men will die screaming."
-Daenerys Targaryen #asoiaf http://t.co/flOWAsHPs1

"His Grace is growing fond of you."
"I can tell. He only threatened to behead me twice."
-Melisandre & Jon #asoiaf http://t.co/a3d4QWBINu

"Robert won the tourney at the Trident, where he unhorsed Rhaegar & made me his queen of love & beauty."
Cersei #duh http://t.co/s0TVM1zLnQ

"There is a savage beast in every man, & when you hand that man a sword or spear & send him forth to war, the beast stirs."
-Jorah Mormont

“I know why my princess wears a veil. Elsewise her beauty would outshine the sun above.”
-Arys Oakheart #asoiaf #wcw http://t.co/ltaoRc4YJC

"And any man who must say ‘I am the king’ is no true king at all."
-Tywin Lannister #asoiaf #HearMeRoar http://t.co/2mC6FSVU1b

"I just want to say to whoever is voting for me that I would certainly make an awful Lord Commander. But so would all these others."
-Edd

He came to Sansa as green fire filled the sky. He took a song & a kiss,& left me nothing but a bloody cloak.
#asoiaf http://t.co/4g20S02dNG

"You look as though you need [a squire] more than most."
"And you look as though you need a clout in the ear."
-Aegon & Duncan #asoiaf

“It ends in blood, as it began.. When Casterly Rock is cracked open, so the sun can shine on the maggots & the worms within.
-Nymeria Sand

“You think this is a jape?”
“I think life is a jape. Yours, mine, everyone’s.”
-Jorah & Tyrion #asoiaf http://t.co/XEfwy4Y8lx

"He has a song. He is the prince that was promised, & his is the song of ice & fire."
-Rhaegar Targaryen #asoiaf http://t.co/stU7puD2Ue

"I don't want to have a dozen sons," she had told him, appalled. "I want to have adventures"
-Asha Greyjoy #asoiaf http://t.co/PPi7fWcEPU

"The Young Wolf is dead," Manderly allowed, "but that brave boy was not Lord Eddard's only son."
-Wyman Manderly http://t.co/5pPYIFXGre

In his chainmail shirt with a sword in his hand, Gendry looked almost a man grown, & dangerous. Hot Pie looked like Hot Pie.
-Arya #asoiaf

"Her father got this child on her? I will not suffer such abominations here. This is not King's Landing."
-Stannis http://t.co/VrV8t9Bdlg

The fat man looked down & smiled. "A drunken dwarf."
"A rotting sea cow.”
“You are insolent. I like that in a dwarf."
-Illyrio &Tyrion
RT @GRRMspeaking: GRRM #icebucketchallenge http://t.co/0Y1h7FRQk5

Then Bowen Marsh stood before him, tears running down his cheeks. "For the Watch.”
-Bowen Marsh #Season5Casting http://t.co/eFqtu2F9xO

A waste of words. If there are gods to listen, they are monstrous gods who torment us for their sport.
-Tyrion http://t.co/4JbzjNMrgT

"Take a knee & swear that bastard sword to me, & rise as Jon Stark, Lord of Winterfell & Warden of the North."
-Stannis Baratheon #asoiaf

"He will not come."
"There is a reason. A dragon is no slave."
-Kraznys & Daenerys #asoiaf http://t.co/lLdSlHOWH6
"Have no fear, Stark. I was only keeping it warm for our friend Robert. It's not a very comfortable seat I'm afraid." http://t.co/SOR4ZzzJYR

She’d tell him, "I missed you" & he’d say it too at the very same moment, the way they always used to.
-Arya #asoiaf http://t.co/bgQEJAIeo8

"We shall serve him lies & Arbor gold & he'll drink them down & ask for more, I promise you."
-Petyr Baelish #asoiaf http://t.co/HeNF48375o

"Is that a beard, or did you forget to wash the dirt off your face? Stannis Baratheon's wife has a thicker mustache."
-Daven Lannister
The best of them overcame flaws, did their duty. The worst... The worst were those who played the Game of Thrones. http://t.co/2ZLVDFMNby

"Some gave me soft words & some blunt, some made excuses, some promises, some only lied. In the end words are just wind."
-Maester Cressen

I beat her to death with mine own hands, but the Crow’s Eye killed her when he shoved himself inside her.
-Victarion http://t.co/HruKyCenvu

"The Seven have never brought me so much as a sparrow. It is time I tried another hawk, Davos. A red hawk."
-Stannis http://t.co/eyvDl3VwvW

"Keep the pony well in hand," he whispered, "And don't look away. Father will know if you do."
-Jon Snow #asoiaf http://t.co/DImq1Tbyk8
I am Cersei of House Lannister, a lion of the Rock, the rightful queen of these Seven Kingdoms. And hair grows back. http://t.co/TBZ2RzAIhB

"I have hungered for a long time. Though not for food. Pray tell me, when will the justice be served?"
-Oberyn Martell #asoiaf

"Kill the boy within you. It takes a man to rule. An Aegon, not an Egg. Kill the boy & let the man be born."
-Aemon http://t.co/koi9JIrbOM

"Some things are best left unsaid, sweetling."
"Even when we are alone?"
"Especially when we are alone."
-Petyr & Sansa #asoiaf

"I let each man cut me once. Count the cuts &you will know how many Strong Belwas has slain."
-Strong Belwas #asoiaf http://t.co/PGP7Xm7eOh

"You have no high ground here, no walls to hide beyond, no natural defenses."
"Yet."
-Theon & Stannis #asoiaf #TWOW http://t.co/TemGbesKjd

"The north remembers, Lord Davos. The north remembers, & the mummer’s farce is almost done. My son is home."
-Wyman Manderly #NeverForget

"Oh," he thought. Then he began to scream.
-Quentyn Martell #asoiaf #dragontamer http://t.co/iURIo923tw

"Prince Rhaegar loved his Lady Lyanna, and thousands died for it."
-Barristan Selmy #asoiaf #r+l=j http://t.co/nSEFXNgvT5

“Lady,” she whimpered softly, wondering if she would meet her wolf again when she was dead.
-Sansa Stark #asoiaf http://t.co/W6lDtUCDjq

"Tysha was... she was what she seemed to be. A crofter's daughter, chance met on the road."
-Jaime Lannister #asoiaf http://t.co/gvoJB3guUj

Serve & obey, he told himself, & he’ll let you live & keep the parts you still have. Remember your name. Reek Reek, it rhymes w/meek.
-Reek
"The frightened child died on the Dothraki Sea, & was reborn in blood & fire. This dragon queen is a true Targaryen." http://t.co/EspAeOwYtF
